original: 知關羽性格自負，籌畫秘策：稱病，由陸遜代位。趁其輕敵，閃電奪南郡、掌握人心，致羽敗走麥城而斬。
text: Knowing Guan Yu's conceited character, plan the secret plan:  call the disease, let Lu Xun take the place. Taking advantage of its underestimation, lightning seized the southern county and grasped the hearts of the people, causing Yu to defeat Maicheng and slash.
